segments.text: Excuse me , can I have your passport , your immigration form and your Customs Declaration Form , please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How long will you be staying at Hotel in China ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: And what's the purpose of your visit ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: And where will you be staying ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: At the Friendship Hotel in Beijing .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK . Could you put your hand baggage on the counter , please ? Do you have any gifts , or food in here ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I have some fresh apples in my suitcase .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm sorry , sir , you can't bring fresh fruit into China . I'm going to have to confiscate these .
segments.speaker: S1
